# onSuggestionSelected

**Instance Property**

A function the system calls when the user selects a suggestion on a search field.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute function onSuggestionSelected;
```

## Discussion

Provide a callback function for the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/keyboard/3678707-onsuggestionselected] attribute to respond to the user selecting one of a `searchField`’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/keyboard/3589336-suggestions]. This value of this attribute must be a function; for example, k`eyboard.onSuggestionSelected = function (searchTerm) {}`.

## Providing and Handling Search Suggestions

- **suggestions**: Search parameters to offer as shortcuts.

items.description: Search parameters to offer as shortcuts.
